document_data.title: Mystery of Deepwater Harbor
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Mystery of Deepwater Harbor''''', designed by [[Brad Gardner]], is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 4th-edition ruleset.

{{Quote|''The Necromancer strikes again at [[Waterdeep]] and the brave [[adventurer]]s must unravel the mystery behind his revenge. This adventure is Part 2 of a major quest, Quest for the Necromancer and follows the story in WATE1-3. A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in Waterdeep for characters levels 7-10. ''|}}

Locations.Buildings & Sites: {{P|[[Dancing Mermaid]]|4-5,7,12,22}} • {{P|[[Dusk to Dawn]]|15}} • {{P|[[Knotted Rope Tavern]]|20}} • {{P|[[Legendary Pottery Shop]]|6}}

Magic.Items: {{P|''[[amulet of health]]''|30}} • {{P|''[[belt of vigor]]''|25,31}} • {{P|''[[boots of swimming]]''|29-30,33}} • {{P|''[[cloak of survival]]''|18,30}} • {{P|''[[everburning torch]]''|7}} • {{P|''[[skull bracers]]''|25,30,33}} • {{P|''[[swimtide harness]]''|18,30,33}}

Index.Organizations: :{{P|[[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]]|6,8,12,16,18-21,29,31}} • {{P|[[Guild of Watermen]]|4-6,12,14,19,23,29,31,34}} • {{P|[[Korring & Sons]]|14}} • {{P|[[Masked Lord]]|4,17-20,29,31,34-37}} • {{P|[[Master Mariners' Guild]]|4-6,8,12,14,20-21,29,31,34}} • {{P|[[Red Diamond Trading Company]]|14,17,19,35}} • {{P|[[Solemn Order of Recognized Furriers and Woolmen]]|4,12}}
